dcterms:description: The REFUGE dataset is used for evaluating automated methods for glaucoma assessment from fundus photographs, specifically focusing on optic disc and cup segmentation tasks.

dcterms:description: RIM-One is an open retinal image database designed for optic nerve evaluation, providing a resource for research in medical imaging.

dcterms:description: The Camelyon dataset is utilized for tumor tissue binary classification tasks, specifically focusing on lymph node status classification across multiple hospitals.
